QuestData.Title: Egg Collection
QuestData.Description: Ahhh, I should have known! You have the look of a hungry initiate.$B$BI would gladly help you choose a serpent egg, but the Slitherscale have thoroughly raided the cloud serpent nests.$B$BI'm terribly sorry. I don't know what to tell you.$B$BUnless you're crazy enough to sneak into the saurok camp to the east and retrieve some stolen cloud serpent eggs, I'm afraid I can't help you.
QuestData.CompletionText: The saurok keep the stolen serpent eggs in their camp.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, wonderful!$B$BThese eggs look...well...they look a little on the small side. Are you sure you couldn't find any better ones?$B$BOh well, I suppose with the current situation, we can't be so picky.
